keyEvents.title: Oars Defeated on Thriller Bark
keyEvents.description: The massive zombie Oars is finally defeated on the deck of Thriller Bark through the Straw Hats' coordinated assault, with his spine shattered by Luffy's Gigant Bazooka.
keyEvents.significance: Marks a turning point in the battle for Thriller Bark, as the greatest zombie threat is eliminated.

keyEvents.title: All Zombies on Thriller Bark Lose Their Shadows
keyEvents.description: Gecko Moria activates Shadows Asgard and absorbs all 1,000 shadows from every zombie on Thriller Bark, causing them to drop lifeless across the entire island-ship.
keyEvents.significance: Dramatically alters the situation on Thriller Bark, eliminating all zombie threats but concentrating all that power into Moria himself.

keyEvents.title: Moria Splits Thriller Bark with Single Punch
keyEvents.description: After transforming through Shadows Asgard, Moria demonstrates his newfound power by punching the ground and creating a massive fissure that splits across Thriller Bark.
keyEvents.significance: Shows the devastating power Moria has gained and the potential threat to the structural integrity of Thriller Bark itself.

description: The world's largest pirate ship, a massive island-ship ruled by Gecko Moria and home to his army of zombies. Site of the climactic battle between the Straw Hats and Oars.
